Richard Lerz is the founder and current COO / President of Pixsy Corpration (Pixsy.com).

Richard’s years of Internet Related Service experience helped him build a leading image and video index syndication platform, powering such sites as Lycos, Sonic Solutions (NASDAQ:SNIC), Pearson (NASDAQ:PSO) and Rediff (NASAQ:REDF).

Pixsy has been named one of Time Magazine’s Top 50 Companies and included in the “AlwaysOn Top 100” for the years 2006 through 2008.
